snippet.title: BOTSU: Ridiculous Robots - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
👇⬇️ Play the FREE DEMO on Steam ⬇️👇
https://store.steampowered.com/app/88...

🎵 Follow on Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@botsu.game
📷 Follow on Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/botsu.game/
🐤 Follow on Twitter:  https://twitter.com/oscarsalandin

I'm making a ragdoll party game!

Botsu is a physics-based, team-sports party game. Play as acrobatic ragdoll robots online and split-screen in sandbox shenanigans. Grab, throw, punch, kick, jump, swing, fly, fall, flip and flop to victory. Earn outfits to build your ultimate bot and show off your skills.
